item.title: A Foreign Office statement said the decision to sack Peter Mandelson was made "in light of the additional information" in emails written by him to Jeffrey Epstein. #JeffreyEpstein #PeterMandelson #USAmbassador #BBCNews

item.title: Former Brazilian president Jair Bolsonaro was found guilty of leading a conspiracy aimed at keeping him in power after he lost the 2022 election to his left-wing rival, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva. #JairBolsonaro #LulaDaSilva #Brazil #BBCNews
